participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

CBCLAF_02.LongName: MOTHERS USUAL TYPE OF WORK, even if not working now. (Please be specific - for example, auto mechanic, high school teacher, homemaker, laborer, lathe operator, show salesman, army sergeant.)
